Senior full-stack Developer - Mer GmbH

Mar 2023 - Dec 2024 | German & English | Remote work - Tech: TS | React | Vite | Docker | Azure

  • Frontend development and deployment of the company's main client-facing dashboard. Usability (UX), reliability (test-driven development), and scalability were concerns for a system utilized by thousands of clients every day

Senior full-stack Developer - Jomigo GmbH

Nov 2022 - Jan 2023 | English | Remote work - Tech: TS | React | NextJs | NodeJs | MySql

  • First engineer to join the company. I initiated the codebase and set the agile tools to develop a CRM dashboard
  • The MVP version of the app was completed. Due to financial issues, the project was halted

Full-stack Developer - Traffective GmbH

Nov 2020 - Oct 2022 | German | Remote work - Tech: Python | Databricks | AWS | TS | NodeJs | Selenium | MongoDB | MySql

  • Built a data driven reporting system using Pyspark and Databricks, which saved sixteen hours of weekly work from the accounting department
  • Wrote a boilerplate package to stardadize any new service. Migated services from Javascript to Typescript

Software Developer - Sport1 GmbH

Jun 2018 - Oct 2020 | German | In-office work - Tech: TS | React Native | NodeJs | Express | Docker | MySql

  • Large use of ReactJS in Typescript with NextJs, GatsbyJs, React Native
  • Built a component libary to be used both in web and in mobile projects
